description.raw:
* Remove tab icon and colour setting timer. This timer was intended to ensure that icons and colours were set eventually even if the tab was in mid-drag and thus not in a notebook (and thus not having a tab handle). This is no longer needed as the new dragdroptabs implementation has the tab
always in a notebook, even in mid-drag.

* Remove some commented out code.

BLACS already relies on a new enough version of labscript_utils that no version requirement is needed to ensure the new dragdroptabs are in use.
description.html:
• Remove tab icon and colour setting timer. This timer was intended to ensure that icons and colours were set eventually even if the tab was in mid-drag and thus not in a notebook (and thus not having a tab handle). This is no longer needed as the new dragdroptabs implementation has the tab always in a notebook, even in mid-drag.

  • Remove some commented out code.

BLACS already relies on a new enough version of labscript_utils that no version requirement is needed to ensure the new dragdroptabs are in use.

title.raw: Removal of unneeded tab settings timeouts.
